snippet.title: Deck Defenders - Card Based Tower Defense Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for my game: Deck Defenders! It's available on Itch.io in Early Access. This means the game will get further development as it gets more and more people to see it/purchase it.

Music: 
The Descent by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4490-the-descent
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
